311273.「ここは ムニエカの町。 \n とても平和で 穏やかな町で 住民の方々も\n み:
This place is called Munieka. It's a very
peaceful and quaint town where its
residents are quite friendly.

311277.「ナブナブ大サーカス団の 出張公演に\n ご来場いただき ありがとうございます！:
Thank you so much for coming to the Grand
Nab-Nab Circus' performance! Please enjoy
the show to your heart's content!

311285.「へへっ 見てくれ！\n サーカスの芸が 大ウケしちまってよ！\n 俺たち すっ:
Heh heh! Feast your eyes! The circus act's a
huge hit with the locals! We've become the
talk of the town!

311287.「この町の住民は みんな 楽しいことが大好き！\n アンタたちみたいなのは 大歓:
The residents here just LOVE anything that's
fun! Folks such as yourselves are very welcome
here. Stay as long as you like!

311289.「エドアルドさんのお家は 町の北側……\n 高台にある 赤い屋根のお屋敷です。:
Eduardo's home is the red-roofed mansion
at the north side of town.

311290.「私たちも ご一緒します。\n 階段をのぼって 行きましょう。:
We'll come along, too. Let's head up the
stairs.

311292.「ここが エドアルドさんのご自宅です。\n とても 気さくで 素敵な方なんですよ:
This is Eduardo's home. He's very friendly
and quite wonderful.

311301.「エ エドアルドさん。\n 大丈夫ですか？: M...Mr. Eduardo. Are you quite all right?

311302.「……ハッ！？\n キミたちは エステラ君と ナブレット君！\n 大変だ！ 僕の:
*gasp*! It's Estella and Nablette!
This isn't good! My Chupie's...

311303.「ハハッ ハデに転んだなあ。\n まーた あの鳥に逃げられちまったのか。:
Nyeheheheheh! You really took a fall there!
That bird got away again, eh?

311304.「ハハハ 情けないことに その通りなんだ。\n アイタタタタ……。:
Ehehehe... It's embarassing to say, but you're
right. Ouch, ouch, ouch...

311305.「エステラ君 ナブレット君。\n すまないが 僕の代わりに また\n チュピちゃ:
I hate to ask this of you two, but do you
think you could help me get Chupie back
again?

311306.「僕はこの通り 脚を痛めてしまって……。\n 追いかけられそうになくてね……。\:
As you can see, my leg isn't in the best shape
right now... Ow, ow, ow, owwww....

311307.「もちろんです。無理をなさらないで。\n チュピちゃんのことは お任せください。:
Of course we will. Please don't push yourself.
Leave Chupie to us.

311308.「チュピちゃんには 脱走癖があって……\n 少し前にも 私とナブレットさんで\n:
Chupie has a habit of escaping...and not too
long ago, Nablette and I caught him.

311309.「隊長。申し訳ありませんが チュピちゃん捜しを\n 手伝っていただけないでしょう:
Excuse me for asking this, but we'll need your
help to find Chupie. Let's find him before he
escapes town!

311311.「ああ チュピちゃん！ 町の外はキケンだから\n 僕のそばから 離れちゃダメだと:
Oh, my Chupie! You KNOW I always say it's
dangerous outside of town, so you mustn't
just wander off like that!

311312.「チュピちゃんを 連れもどしてくれて\n 感謝するよ。……おっと キミたちふたり:
Thank you for bringing Chupie back to me.
Oh...? I suppose I haven't introduced myself
to you two yet, have I?

311313.「ようこそ ムニエカの町へ！\n 僕は ここの町長を任されている\n エドアルド:
Welcome to Munieka! My name is Eduardo, and I
am the mayor of this fine town. It's a
pleasure to meet your acquaintance.

311314.「あたしは ポルテ。こっちにいるのは\n 我らが調査隊の <pc>隊長だよ！\n:
I'm Porte! Next to me is <pc>,
captain of our exploration team!
Pleasure to meet you, Eduardo!

311315.「エドアルドさんは 天才人形師でもあって\n チュピちゃんや そこにいらっしゃる:
Eduardo is also a genius puppeteer. Chupie
and Mudara over there were created by him.

311316.「ハッハッハッハ！\n 天才だなんて 大げさだな。\n このくらいは ちょちょい:
Ahahaha! A genius, you say...? That's
a bit of an exaggeration. It's just easy
for me to do, that's all.

311317.「そういや お前さん\n 脚は もう平気なのか？\n けっこう ハデにやってたじ:
By the way, is your leg okay now? You were
actin' quite dramatic back there.

311318.「心配ご無用！ キミたちが帰ってくるまでに\n 完璧に 直しておいたからね。ご覧:
No need to worry! I fixed it right up before
you all came back. As you can see, I'm even
able to dance! Rah-tah-tah! ♪

311319.「そうだ！ 本日 エステラ君とナブレット君の\n 歓迎会を 開催する予定なのだが:
That's right! Today we're going to throw a
welcoming party for Estella and Nablette,
so you two are welcome to join as well!

311320.「ブラボー！ おたくらのダンス\n 最高じゃねえか！ 全員 ナブナブサーカス団に:
Bravo! Your dance moves are spectacular!
You all should think about joining the
Grand Nab-Nab Circus!

311321.「料理も すっごくおいしー！\n こんなおもてなしを してくれるなんて\n エド:
The food is absolutely delish! What an
upstanding guy to give us this kind of
hospitality!

311322.「ハッハッハッ ありがとう ありがとう！\n この町は 気にいっていただけたかな:
Hahahah! Thank you, thank you!
So you've really taken a liking to this town,
yes?

311323.「ええ とっても！ 景観も美しく\n 住民の皆さんは 本当に優しくて……\n ず:
Yes, very much so! The scenery is so beautiful
and its residents so kind... I would just love
to stay here forever if I could.

311324.「それは 良かった！\n この町は 僕のすべてだからね……。:
That's good to hear!
This town means everything to me...

311325.「僕も キミたちのことが 大いに気にいってね。\n キミたちに 特別な贈り物を用:
I like you all so much that I've prepared a
special gift. I hope it pleases you!

311327.「ナブおじさん！？\n どうしたの？ だいじょうぶ……？: Mr. Nab! What's wrong? Are you okay...?!

311329.「あれ どうしたんだろ……。\n 目の前が 暗く……:
What...is happening to me...?
Everything's...going dark...

311330.「まったく この愚か者が……。\n 相手の術中に まんまとハマりおって……。:
Honestly, what a fool you are...
You've fallen right into their trap...

311331.「目を覚ませ <pc>。\n こんなところで 寝ている場合ではない。\n 己がつ:
Wake up already, <pc>.
This is no time to be sleeping.
You still have your duty.

311333.「そういえば 料理を食べてたら\n 急に 気が遠くなって……。\n もしかして:
Now I remember... After I ate that food, I
felt all woozy... Maybe it was laced with
something...?

311334.「外側から 鍵が かかってる……。\n あたしたち 閉じこめられちゃったみたい。:
It's locked from the outside...
Guess we're locked in here.

311335.「それに エッちゃんと\n ナブおじさんが いない……。\n ふたりとも どこに:
Etsie and Mr. Nab are gone, too...
Wonder where they went...

311336.「……ほへ？ さっき あたしが\n <pc>を 起こさなかったかって？\n うう:
...what? You're asking if I'm the one who
woke you up? Uh uh. I was asleep the whole
time, so I have no clue.

311337.「こうしていても しかたないよね。\n とにかく ここから 脱出しなくっちゃ！:
Well, no use just twiddling our thumbs.
We have to get out of here!

311338.「……うーん。\n この扉 鍵がかかってて 開かないみたい。\n いかにもって感:
Hmmm.... Seems like it's locked and won't
open. It's pretty suspicious, don't you think?

311339.「鍵穴が ないみたいだから\n ３ケタの 暗証番号を入れて\n 開ける仕組みなん:
There's no keyhole, so I guess it can only
be opened with a 3-digit code...

311340.「そこに 誰かいるの？\n 隠れてないで 出てきて！:
Is someone there?! Stop hiding and show
yourself!

311341.「へぅぅぅ……。\n ご ごめんなさい 怪しい者ではぁ……。\n ひどいこと し:
Eeeeeeekkk....
A...apologies... Nothing suspicious about
me... Please don't do anything bad...

311342.「あれ？ キミは……\n エドアルドさんと いっしょにいた\n ドロテア……だっ:
Huh? You...were with Eduardo, right?
Mudara...was it?

311343.「どうして 隠れて あたしたちのこと見てたの？\n キミが ふたりを誘拐した犯人:
Why were you hiding and watching us? Were you
the one who kidnapped us?

311344.「ち ち 違いますぅ～！\n ドロテア 誘拐なんてしていません……！\n ただ:
N...no...no way...! Mudara didn't k-kidnap
anybody...! She was j-just watching...

311345.「……見ていた？\n もしかして エッちゃんと ナブおじさんが\n どこにいるか:
...you were watching? Then, do you know where
Estie and Mr. Nab went?

311347.「おふたりは そのぉ……。\n ご主人様……エドアルド様が\n そちらの扉の奥に:
The two of them, um....
M-Master...Eduardo took them b-behind that
door over there...

311348.「やっぱり エドアルドさんが 犯人だったんだ！\n むきーっ！ ちょっとでも\n:
I KNEW Eduardo was behind this! Grrrrr! I
thought he was a good guy, even just a
little!

311349.「料理に 薬なんて 盛るくらいだもん！\n ふたりが 何されるか わかんないよ。:
The worst he did to us was spike our food!
Who knows what he'll do to them! We gotta
save them fast!

311350.「ドロテア！\n この扉の暗証番号を 教えて！\n あたしたち 仲間を助けたいん:
Mudara! Tell me the door code! I want to save
my friends!

311351.「ひぃぃ ごめんなさい……。\n ドロテア 暗証番号 知らないですぅ……。:
Aaiiieee.... S-sorry...
Mudara...doesn't know the code...

311352.「えええ！ そんなぁ！\n どうしよう……。:
Whaaat? Seriously...!?
What do we do...?

311353.「あ あの……暗証番号はわかりませんけど\n 手がかりは ありますぅ。\n 扉を:
U...um... She... doesn't know the code but
there's a clue... Please look closely at the
door...

311354.<center>汝 扉の秘密を 暴きたくば\nムニエカに伝わる舞を 舞え\n朝昼:
If you wish to discover the secrets that lie beyond this door, one must perform the traditional Munieka dances of morning,
afternoon, and night. Those who dance and turn correctly shall see the door open before them.

311355.「この文章は ご主人様が\n 書かれたものなんですけど ご主人様も\n よく 暗:
This passage was written by the Master, though
it seems he often forgets the code...

311356.「こうして 扉にヒントを書いたんですぅ……。\n この町の人たちは 踊りが大好き:
So that's why there's a hint on the door...
Since the people of this town love dancing,
maybe talking to them will help...?

311357.「でもさ ドロテア。\n キミは エドアルドさんに仕えているんでしょ？\n あた:
But, Mudara...you work with Eduardo, right?
Are you sure you're okay with helping us?

311358.「えっと……ドロテア ご主人様の人形なので\n ご主人様の邪魔しちゃ いけないん:
U-umm... Mudara wishes not to disturb the
Master because she is his doll... But she
feels sorry for all of you...

311359.「……ありがとう ドロテア。\n キミって とっても 優しいんだね。: Thanks, Mudara. You really are kind.

311360.「<pc>！ ドロテアの言う通り\n ムニエカの町の人から 話を聞いて\n 暗証:
<pc>! Mudara's right. Let's talk to
the townsfolk and see if we can't find
a clue to the code!

311362.「早くふたりを 助けてあげなくちゃ。\n まったく 本当に エドアルドさんって\:
I have to save them both as soon as possible.
Mr. Eduardo really is an extraordinary person,
isn't he?

311363.「あたしたちを\n 無理やり 眠らせて 監禁するなんて\n いくらなんでも ひど:
Forcing us to sleep and locking us up is just
too much.

311364.「ご ご主人様 悪いヒトじゃないんですぅ。\n いつも みんなに 優しく接してく:
Master, you are not a bad person. He is always
kind to everyone and always thinks of the town
first.

311365.「そ それに それに！\n かつて このムニエカの町を\n お救いくださった 英:
And besides, he is a hero who once saved
Munieka! He is the hero who once saved
Munieka...

311367.「昔 恐ろしい災害が 世界を襲い\n 美しかった ムニエカの町の\n すべてが:
A long time ago, a terrible disaster struck
the world and everything that was beautiful in
Munieka was lost...

311368.「町を失い ドン底の私たちに\n 救いの手を 差しのべてくださったのが\n 他で:
We had lost our town and were at rock bottom,
but it was Eduardo, of all people, who came to
our rescue.

311369.「エドアルド様は 私たち\n ムニエカの住民のため 長い間\n 町の再建に 心血:
Mr. Eduardo has worked long and hard to
rebuild the town for us, the residents of
Munieka.

311370.「町が元通りに復興し 私たちがこうして\n 平和に 暮らすことができるのは\n:
It is all thanks to Eduardo that the town has
been restored to its original state and we are
able to live in peace.

311371.「そんなことがあったんだ……。\n エドアルドさんは この町のことを\n とても:
I didn't know that happened...Eduardo, you
must have a very special place in your heart
for this town.

311372.「はいぃ……。ご主人様は 町のみんなが\n 快適に暮らせるよう いつも 細かなと:
Master always pays attention to the smallest
details so that everyone in town can live
comfortably.

311373.「もう二度と みんなが\n 悲しい思いをしないように……。\n ずっと 笑顔で:
I hope that everyone will never feel sad
again... May we live happily ever after with
smiles on our faces.

311374.「本当に 優しくて すばらしいお方……。\n ドロテアは そんな エドアルド様の:
Mudara truly admires Mr. Eduardo, such a kind
and wonderful person...

311376.「ひぃ！ とんでもないですぅ！\n ドロテアみたいな ドジで 醜い人形が\n ご:
No way! I'm afraid that a clumsy, ugly doll
like Mudara would be so afraid to do Master a
favor...

311377.「そんなことないよ！ 誰かを好きになるって\n とっても ステキなことだと思う。:
That's not true! I think it's a wonderful
thing to fall in love with someone, and I'm
sure Eduardo would be very happy to hear that.

311378.「そ そうですかねぇ……でへへ……。\n いつか ご主人様に ドロテアの想いのす:
I wonder if that's so...hehehe... I wonder if
one day master will understand all of Mudara's
thoughts...

311379.「でも……そんな人が どうして\n エッちゃんと ナブおじさんを\n 誘拐したり:
But... why would someone like that kidnap
Ekchan and Uncle Nabu?

311380.「エドアルドさんが 本当に悪い人かどうか……\n この先に進んでみれば わかるこ:
Whether or not Mr. Eduardo is really a bad
guy...we'll find out when we move on. Let's go
<pc>! Mudara!

311381.「ここは……いろいろ 置いてあるね。\n エドアルドさんの アトリエかな？: This place has a lot of stuff.

311382.「うわっ！？ ビックリしたぁ……。\n これ……人形？: Wow! I'm so surprised... Is this... a doll?

311383.「本物の人間かと 思っちゃった。\n よくできてるねぇ。:
I thought it was a real human. It's very well
made.

311384.「<cs_pchero>隊長！ ポルテさん！\n こちらに いらっしゃったのです:
Captain <cs_pchero>! Porte-san! I see you
are here.

311385.「エッちゃん！ ナブおじさん！\n ふたりとも 無事だったんだね。: Eck! Uncle Nav! You two are safe.

311386.「ハッハッハッ！ 何言ってるんだ。\n 見てみろ 健康そのもの。\n 絶好調だぜ:
Ha-ha-ha! What are you talking about? Look at
you. You're in perfect health. I'm in great
shape!

311387.「私たち エドアルドさんに とても\n 良くしていただいて……すばらしい贈り物ま:
Eduardo has been very kind to us...he even
gave us a wonderful gift.

311388.「ムニエカは 本当に すてきな町。\n 私 すっかり ここが気に入ってしまって…:
Munieka is a really nice town. I've fallen in
love with this place. So I would like to ask
you a question...

311389.「みんなで一緒に この町で 暮らしませんか？: Why don't we all live together in this town?

311391.「そうそう この町のヤツらと 毎日\n 歌ったり踊ったり……ずっと楽しく暮らすん:
Yes, yes, I'm going to sing and dance every day with the people of this town and live happily ever after. Just thinking about it,
isn't it great?

311392.「ここにいれば 何もかもが 安心だ。\n 俺たちを苦しめるものは 何もない。\n:
Everything is safe here. Nothing can hurt us.
There's no other place like heaven.

311393.「エドアルドも 町のみんなも\n 俺たちを 歓迎してくれてる。\n 悪い話じゃね:
Eduardo and the whole town is welcoming us.
That's not bad, right?

311394.「ね？ <cs_pchero>さん。\n 私たちと ムニエカの町にとどまり\n:
Hey? <cs_pchero>. Let's stay in Munieka
with us and live happily ever after, forever
and ever, shall we?<yesno><close>

311395.「まぁ うれしい！\n みんなで 幸せになりましょうね……。:
Well, I am happy! Let's all be happy
together...

311396.「<cs_pchero>の バカーッ！\n お母さんを 助けるんじゃなかったの！:
<cs_pchero>'s Bakkar! I thought you were
going to save your mother! That's crazy, no
matter what you think!

311397.「おいおい！\n こんなウマい話を 断るなんて 冗談だろ！？:
Oh, come on! You've got to be kidding me if
you turn down a great offer like this!

311398.「そうだよね <cs_pchero>！\n 一刻も早く お母さんを 助けなきゃだ:
That's right <cs_pchero>! I have to save my
mom as soon as possible. Besides, it's crazy
no matter how you think about it!

311399.「エッちゃんと ナブおじさんが\n こんなこと 言うはずない。\n きっと 誰か:
Ekchan and Uncle Nabu would never say
something like this. They must be being
manipulated by someone.

311400.「そんな ひどい……！\n どうして 理解してくださらないのですか？\n おふた:
That's terrible..! Why don't you understand? I
just want you two to be happy.

311401.「……残念だが しかたねえ。\n 言うこと聞かない 悪い子には\n オシオキが必:
I'm sorry, but it is what it is. A bad boy who
doesn't listen to me needs to be punished.

311402.「ええ……そうですね……。\n 多少 痛い目を見せてでも\n わかってもらわなけ:
Yes...yes... We have to make them understand,
even if it hurts a little.

311405.「エッちゃん ナブおじさん……？\n や やりすぎちゃったかな……。: Ekchan, Uncle Nabu...? I think I overdid it...

311406.「<cs_pchero>……\n これ エッちゃんと\n ナブおじさんじゃない…:
<cs_pchero>...this is not Ekchan and Uncle
Nabu...

311407.「ふたりそっくりに作られた……人形だ。:
They were made to look exactly like each
other...dolls.

311408.「お見事！ 最高のショーだったね！\n 感動したよ！:
Well done! That was the best Sho ever! I'm so
impressed!

311409.「……やっぱり\n エドアルドさんの しわざだったんだね。: I knew it was Eduardo's work.

311410.「ソレは 僕から キミたちへの贈り物なのだが\n まだ未完成でね。自力で動くこと:
It was a gift from me to you, but it's not
finished yet. It can't move on its own, so
I've been controlling it.

311411.「安心したまえ。今は 空っぽの人形だけど\n ここに ふたりの魂が入れば ちゃー:
Don't worry. She's just an empty doll right now, but once the souls of the two of you enter her, she'll be able to move around and
talk to you just fine.

311412.「キャァ！？ 何するの！ 離してっ！: Caw! What are you doing? Get off me!

311413.「この感触……。\n <cs_pchero>！ この人たちも 人形だよっ。\n:
This feel... <cs_pchero>! These people are
dolls too. No way... all the people in town...

311414.「そう お察しの通り\n ムニエカの住民は 全員 人形さ。\n もちろん この僕:
Yes, as you may have guessed, the inhabitants
of Munieka are all puppets. Of course, I am no
exception.

311415.「信じられないといった顔だね。\n そうだなぁ すべては 奇跡のチカラの賜物……:
You look like you can't believe it. Well, I
guess it's all a result of miracles...or
something like that.

311416.「キミたちを 眠らせたのは 他でもない。\n キミたちも 今の肉体を捨て 僕たち:
I put you to sleep in the hope that you, of
all people, would give up your current bodies
and become dolls just like us.

311417.「えぇ！ 今ある肉体を捨てるって……\n そんなの 絶対ヤダよ！！:
Yes! Throwing away the body I have now...I
absolutely don't want to do that!

311418.「おやおや 怖がる必要なんてないよ。\n 今より性能のいい身体に 生まれ変わるん:
Well, well, well. There's no need to be afraid. You're about to be reborn in a body that performs even better than the one you
have now. It's great, isn't it?

311419.「この世界で 生きていくには\n ヒトの身体は もろすぎる。\n みんな 簡単に:
Human bodies are too fragile to survive in
this world. We all break down easily and die.

311420.「だが 人形の身体であれば 多少の故障なら\n 修理できるし 完全に壊れたとして:
But if it's a puppet body, it can be repaired if it's slightly broken, and even if it's completely broken, as long as the soul is
intact, it can be rebuilt again, right?

311421.「この町の平和と笑顔を\n 守りつづけることが 僕の責務だからね。\n みんなを:
It is my duty to keep the peace and smiles of
this town. I can't let everyone die.

311422.「僕は キミたちのことが 本当に気に入った。\n だから キミたちにも 死んでほ:
I really like you guys. That's why I don't
want you to die. I want you to live forever in
this town.

311423.「いい……いいぞ！\n これほどまでに 心躍るモチーフに\n お目にかかるのは:
I love it...I love it! It's been a while since
I've seen such an inspiring motif!

311424.「……<cs_pchero>君 キミは 本当に\n すばらしい人生を 歩んできた:
...<cs_pchero> you have had a really great
life. You will make a great doll. I guarantee
it!

311425.「キミたちの存在を 永遠のものにしてあげる。\n 僕たちと この町で ずっと楽し:
I will make your existence eternal. Let's live
happily ever after in this town with us.

311426.「ふたりとも！ ご無事ですか！？: Both of you! Are you all right?

311427.「エッちゃん！ ナブおじさん！\n 良かった！ ホンモノなんだね！:
Eck! Uncle Nabu! Thank God! It's real, isn't
it?

311428.「エドアルドさんよぉ？\n 相手の了承もなく 人形に改造しようとするたぁ\n ち:
Mr. Eduardo? You're a little bit too much of a
jerk to try to turn him into a doll without
his consent, aren't you?

311429.「人形の身体なんか\n まっぴらごめんの こんこんちきだぜ！\n わかったら さ:
I'm not interested in a doll body! If you
understand, get on with it and give up!

311430.「なぜ 理解してくれないんだい？ 人形の身体は\n 生身の肉体より ずーっと い:
Why don't you understand? A doll's body is so
much better than flesh and blood, you know?
Look at the beauty, the strength...

311432.「なんてことだッ！\n 軽く たたいただけで 故障してしまうとは……\n まさか:
Oh my God! To think that just a light tap could cause it to malfunction... Are you saying that the power of miracles has reached
its limit?

311433.「……へっ！ よくわからねえが\n 散々 好き勝手やってくれた礼は\n キッチリ:
Heh! I don't know about you, but I'm going to
have to thank you for doing whatever you want,
aren't I?

311434.「……待って！ ご主人様に 悪気はないんです！\n 皆さまのことを 想いすぎて\:
...Wait! Master-sama doesn't have bad
intentions! I just thought too much about
everyone and overdid it.

311435.「悪気がなかったら\n 何やってもいいってワケじゃねえだろ。\n おい 聞いてん:
You can't do anything you want if you don't
mean any harm. Hey, you hear me, Eduardo?

311436.「奇跡が消えれば ムニエカの町は終わる……。\n ちくしょう このままでは\n:
If the miracle disappears, Munieka will end...
Damn it, if things continue as they are, we
won't be able to fulfill our promise...

311437.「お おい……どうした？\n 急に しおらしくなっちまったじゃねえか……。\n:
Hey...what's the matter? He's suddenly turned
limp... What's going on?

311438.「……ああ すまない。そうだね。\n キミたちにも ちゃんと\n 説明したほうが:
Oh, I'm sorry. I guess I'd better explain it
to you guys.

311439.「もう少し 落ちつけそうな場所……\n ２階にある僕の私室で 話そうか。:
Let's talk in my private office on the second
floor where you can be a little more relaxed.

311440.「……それで？ 説明よりも先に 俺たちに\n 何か 言うことが あるんじゃないの:
So... so what? Don't you have something to say
to us before you explain?

311442.「はて？ じゃないよ！\n いきなり 人形にされそうになって\n あたしたち す:
Huh? That's not what I meant! We were almost
turned into dolls out of nowhere, and we had a
really scary time!

311443.「ハハハ ごめんごめん。サプライズの\n つもりだったんだが 演出過剰だったかね:
I'm sorry, I meant it to be Supura-es, but I
guess I was overdramatizing. I'll try to add
or subtract next time!

311445.「エドアルドさん。先ほど\n 住民の方が 突然 倒れてしまいましたが\n 大丈夫:
Mr. Eduardo. A few minutes ago, one of our
residents suddenly collapsed, is he all right?

311446.「ああ 取り乱してしまって 悪かったね。\n 一応 動けることは\n 動けると:
Oh, I'm sorry for being so distracted. I think
I can move about as much as I can...

311447.「しかし それも いつまでもつか。\n 奇跡のチカラの枯渇だけは どうしようもな:
But for how long? There is nothing we can do
about the depletion of our miraculous power.

311448.「奇跡の……枯渇？\n ムニエカのみんなが 人形なのと\n 何か 関係があるの？:
Miracle... depletion? What does that have to
do with everyone in Munieka being puppets?

311449.「僕たちは 大昔 この世界を襲った災害によって\n 生身の肉体を 失ってしまって:
We lost our flesh and blood in a disaster that
struck this world a long time ago. We should
have died there, but...

311450.「この町を訪れていた ふしぎなチカラを持つ\n 旅人の女性が 死にかけの\n 僕:
A traveler woman with magical powers who was
visiting this town saved our dying lives.

311451.「彼女のチカラで 魂と人形を結びつけることで\n 僕らは 生身の身体のときと同様:
Her power to connect the soul to the doll
allows us to live as if we were in the flesh.
It is a miracle.

311452.「だが……それから 長い年月が経ち\n 僕らの身体に宿った 奇跡のチカラが\n:
But then...as the years have passed, the
miraculous power that resides in our bodies
seems to have gradually faded...

311453.「奇跡のチカラが 完全に失われれば\n 魂と人形の結びつきも 失われ……\n ム:
If the power of the miracle were completely lost, the connection between the soul and the doll would be lost and the inhabitants of
Munieka would all be dead.

311454.「そんな……。その女性は\n 今 どちらにいらっしゃるのですか？: Oh no... Where is this woman now?

311455.「僕は 長い間 彼女と共に\n 町の復興と住民の修繕に 努めていた。\n だが:
For a long time, I worked with her to rebuild the town and repair its inhabitants. But just when we were about to complete the
reconstruction...

311456.「彼女は突然 この町から 姿を消してしまった。\n 今どこにいるかも どうしてい:
She suddenly disappeared from this town. I
don't know where she is or how she is doing.

311457.「……僕は 彼女と約束したんだ。\n 彼女が 好きだと言ってくれた ムニエカの町:
I made a promise to her. She told me she loved
Munieka and that she would keep everyone
smiling forever.

311458.「このままでは 約束を果たせなくなってしまう。\n いったい どうすればいいんだ:
If I don't do something, I won't be able to
fulfill my promise. What the hell should I
do...?

311460.「西にある森の奥 精霊の泉……。\n あそこになら 残っているかも……。:
Deep in the woods to the west, Spring of
Spirits... There might be some left there...

311461.「彼女が足しげく通っていた 泉か……。\n たしかに あの泉には 古き精霊の祝福:
The fountain she frequented... Indeed, there
is a legend in the town that the blessing of
an ancient spirit dwells in that fountain.

311462.「今思えば 彼女は 泉のチカラを使い\n 奇跡を起こしていたのかもしれない。\n:
Now that I think about it, she may have used the power of the fountain to create a miracle...if only there had been water from
the fountain.

311463.「だが 今や あの森は\n 魔物が生息する 危険な場所だ。\n ムニエカの住民で:
But now that forest is a dangerous place
inhabited by monsters. The inhabitants of
Munieka would have no chance.

311464.「なら あたしたちが泉の水を取ってくるよ！\n エドアルドさんは ともかく\n:
We'll go get water from the fountain! I feel
sorry for Mr. Eduardo and the people of the
town!

311465.「ええ……エドアルドさんがしたことは\n たしかに 許されませんが 住民の皆さん:
Yes...what Mr. Eduardo did is unforgivable,
but we cannot abandon our residents.

311466.「やれやれ……あんな目にあったってのに\n 嬢ちゃんたちは 優しいな。\n ま:
My goodness... you girls are so sweet after
all that happened. Well, it's a ship we're in.
Let's cooperate.

311467.「ああ……ありがとう！\n キミたちは なんて すばらしいんだ！\n ますます:
Oh...thank you! I want to make a doll more and
more.

311468.「……冗談はさておき 泉は ムニエカ地方の\n 西の森の中だ。危険な場所なので:
...All joking aside, the fountain is in the forest west of Munieka Region. It's a dangerous place, so I usually forbid people to
enter, but I'll give you special permission.

311469.「み…道案内は ドロテアにお任せください。\n しょ…正直 すごく怖いですけど…:
Please leave it to Mudara to show you the way.
To be honest, I'm very scared...but I want to
be useful to Master and everyone else...!

311471.「頼りにしてるからね ドロテア！\n さぁ ムニエカの町を救うため\n みんなで:
We're counting on you, Mudara! Now, let's all
go to the fountain to save Munieka!

311473.「木々が 結晶で\n 固められているようですね……。: The trees seem to be crystallized...

311474.「なんつーか……キレイなんだけどよぉ。\n ちょっとばかり 不気味な景色だよな。:
It's kind of... beautiful, but... It's a
little bit eerie.

311475.「もともとは 普通の森だったんですが\n 世界を襲った大災害を きっかけに\n:
It used to be an ordinary forest, but it
became like this after the great disaster that
struck the world.

311476.「緑が たくさんあって……\n 町の人も ドロテアも\n この森のこと 大好きだ:
There was so much greenery...the townspeople
and Mudara loved this forest...

311477.「魔物が 出るようになってから\n 誰も 近づかなくなっちゃいましたぁ……。\n:
Since the monster came out, no one comes near
here anymore... Sigh...

311478.「かつて この世界で いったい\n 何が起こったと いうのでしょうか？: What in the world happened in the past?

311479.「精霊の泉は この森の 奥にあります。\n 気をつけて 進みましょうねぇ……。:
Spring of Spirits is located deep in this
forest. Let's proceed with care...

311481.「おいおい。\n 泉なんて 影も形もねえじゃねえか。:
Hey, hey, there's not a shadow of a fountain
in sight.

311482.「道を 間違えてしまったのでしょうか……？: Have I taken the wrong road...?

311483.「そ そんな……。\n ドロテア この場所が好きで\n たくさん来てたから 間違:
Mudara, I love this place and I come here a
lot, so there's no way I could have made a
mistake...

311485.「寒い……。\n 凍てつくような 悲しみと絶望のかたまり……。:
It's cold... A frozen mass of grief and
despair...

311486.「泣きながら 近づいてきてる……。\n すぐ そこまで来てる……。:
It's coming closer, crying... It's coming
right to us...

311487.「ゲッ！？ なんだ このバケモノ！？: Geez! What the hell is this monster?

311489.「ボ ボウイヤダダダダダ……\n ゴンナガダダァァ……ダエダデナイィィ……。:
Bo bo yada dada dada dada...gon naga dada
daaa...dae dada denaiyi...

311492.「おっと！\n だいじょうぶかい お嬢さんがた？\n あぶないから 俺から 離れ:
Oops! Are you all right, ladies? Stay close to
me, for your own safety.

311493.「ポルテとドロテアは 俺に任せときな！\n おめえらは そのバケモノの相手を頼む:
Leave Porte and Mudara to me! You two take
care of that monster!

311494.「お任せください！\n いきましょう <cs_pchero>隊長！:
Leave it to us! Let's go Captain
<cs_pchero>!

311495.「今のは いったい なんだったのでしょう？\n 怨霊のたぐいのようにも\n 見え:
What on earth was that? It looked like some
kind of grudge...

311496.「さてなぁ……。\n そっちも気になるが それよりも……:
Well... I'm curious about that too, but more
than that...

311497.「泉なんて どこにも見当たらねえ。\n カラッカラに 乾いた地面があるだけだ。:
There is no fountain anywhere. There is only
dry ground in Karakka La.

311498.「もしかしたら 長い時が経ちすぎて 泉の水も\n 涸れてしまったのかもしれません:
Maybe too much time has passed and the water
in the fountain has run dry... The power of
miracle is also with us...

311499.「そ そんな……。\n みんなが 助からないって知ったら\n ご主人様 悲しみま:
Oh, no... Master-sama would be sad if he knew
that we won't all survive... Besides...

311500.「ドロテアも ムニエカの町が 大好きだから……\n みんなに 死んでほしくないで:
Mudara loves Munieka too...so I don't want
everyone to die... No, no, no...

311501.「……こんなときに 何もできないなんて。\n あたしに もっと チカラがあれば\:
I can't believe I can't do anything at a time
like this. If I had more power, I might have
been able to do something.

311503.「泣くな バカ者。\n ……しかたない。\n 特別に 手を貸してやろうかの。:
Don't cry, fool. ...I have no choice. I'll
make a special effort to help you.

311505.「ふむ。たしかに 泉は\n ずいぶん前に 涸れてしまったようじゃ。\n だが……:
Hmmm. It is true that the fountain ran dry a
long time ago. But...it is not dead.

311507.「別に 大したことはしておらん。\n この地に眠っていた 水脈に はたらきかけ\:
I didn't do much. I just revived the fountain
by working on the water veins that were lying
dormant in this area.

311510.「お おい……いつもの元気は どうした？\n 人が変わったみてえじゃねえか。:
Hey, hey... where's your usual energy? You
seem to have changed.

311511.「これで 町のみんなは助かるのですね！\n ふえええええ 本当に\n ありがとう:
So this will help everyone in town! Wheeeeee,
thank you so much...!

311512.「なんじゃ 人の顔をまじまじと見て……。\n 我の顔に 何かついているか？\n<:
What is it? Look at a person's face... Is
there something on my face?
<select_nc>
Did you meet him at the unveiling ceremony?
Porte... no?
<select_end>
<case 1>
<close>
<case 2>
<close>
<case_cancel>
<close>
<case_end>

311513.「そうか……。\n 我と 顔を合わせるのは あの時以来か。\n そなたには 話し:
I see... I haven't seen you since that time,
have I? I think it would be a good idea to
talk about this with you.

311514.「どうやら 混乱させてしまったようじゃな。\n そなたには 話しておいても よい:
It seems I have confused you. I think it would
be a good idea to talk to you about it.

311515.「今 こうして 話している我と\n そなたと これまで行動を共にしていた\n ポ:
I am talking to you right now, and Porte, with
whom I have been working, is a different
personality.

311516.「我は故あって 普段は 存在を隠しておるが……\n まぁ 事情が事情だったからの:
I usually keep my presence a secret for a reason, but circumstances were such that I had to do something about it. This time is
special.

311517.「うむ……チカラを使い 少々疲れた。\n 悪いが しばらく 休ませてもらおう。:
Well...I'm a little tired from all the energy
I've expended. I'm sorry, but I'm going to
have to rest for a while.

311518.「創失の呪いを解くカギは\n 間違いなく この ゼニアスにある……。\n この地:
The key to unlocking the curse of unmaking is
definitely here in Zeniath... Seek the truth
hidden in this land.

311519.「……このバカ弟子を よろしく頼む。:
Please take good care of this stupid
apprentice.

311521.「あれっ？ 泉が復活してる！\n すごいすごい！ どうやったの？:
Huh? Fountain is back! That's great, great!
How did you do that?

311522.「どうやったのって お前がやったんだろうが。\n なんか 様子が変だったし\n:
How did you do it? You did it, didn't you? Something was wrong with her, and she must have gotten tired from exerting so much
energy.

311523.「……ええ！？ これ あたしがやったの？\n うそー！ なんだかわかんないけど\:
What? Did I do this? No way! I don't know what
it is, but I'm amazing!

311524.「この泉の水……強い創生のチカラが 宿ってる。\n エドアルドさんの 言ってた通:
The water in this fountain...it has a strong
power of creation...and as Eduardo said, it
could help the people of this town!

311525.<cs_pchero>たちは ドロテアが用意していた\n水瓶が いっぱいになるよ:
<cs_pchero> and the others filled the
fountain with water so that the water bottles
Mudara had prepared would be full.

311526.<cs_pchero>は\n精霊の泉の水（だいじなもの）を\n手に入れた！<me:
<cs_pchero> received Spring of Spirits Water
(Key Item)!<me 60>

311527.「ふぅ……これで よし！\n さあ 急いで エドアルドさんに\n 泉の水を 持ち:
Well... that's it! Come on, let's hurry up and
bring back some fountain water for Mr.
Eduardo.

311528.「おお……！\n ありがとうございます エドアルドさん！: Oh...! Thank you very much Eduardo!

311529.「見てください！ あれだけ\n サビついたように 固まっていた身体が\n 自由に:
Look at this! My body, which was so rusty and
stiff, now moves freely!

311530.「すごいぞッ！\n まるで 新品同然じゃないか！！: This is amazing! It's as good as new!

311531.「キミたちが 水瓶いっぱいに\n 泉の水を 持ち帰ってくれたからね。\n 今後し:
You and your friends brought back bottles full
of water from the fountain. This town will be
safe for a while.

311532.「これは 僕からの感謝の気持ちさ。\n 受けとってくれたまえ！:
This is my way of saying thank you. Please
accept it!

311533.「良かったなぁ セアトロさん！\n アンタが 動かなくなったら\n 俺たちも 悲: We'll be sad when you stop working.

311534.「これで あたしたちも 故障におびえず\n 暮らすことが できるんだね。\n 本:
Now we can live without the fear of
breakdowns. I'm really glad!

311535.「えへへ みんな うれしそうに笑ってる。\n いいことした後って 気持ちいいね。:
Everyone is smiling happily. It feels good
after doing something good, doesn't it? Ah..!
Look!

311536.「星封の結晶に チカラが集まってる。\n ムニエカのみんなの ありがとうって気持:
The Benevogem is filled with power. The
crystals are filled with the feelings of
gratitude of everyone in Munieka...

311537.「星のオーラが 手に入ったんだ！\n すっごく きれい……。: I got Benevolessence! It's so beautiful...

311538.「ひとまず 一件落着か。\n この町については まだ いろいろ\n 気になること:
I guess that's all settled for the time being.
There are still many things about this town
that are of concern to me...

311539.「俺たちは いったん 町のことを\n ドゥラに報告するために 折を見て\n はじ:
We will return to the Land of Beginnings to
report back to Dura about the town.

311540.「<pc>隊長 ポルテさん。\n 調査にご協力いただき ありがとうございます。\:
Captain <pc> Porte. Thank you for
your cooperation in our survey. I will see you
later.

311541.「おや？ もう 行ってしまうのかい？\n さびしくなるなあ。:
Oh? Are you leaving already? I'm going to miss
you.

311542.「皆さま 本当に\n ありがとうございましたぁ……。\n このご恩は 一生 忘れ:
Thank you all so much... I will never forget
this debt of gratitude...

311543.「うん！ キミたちのおかげで\n 彼女との約束を破らずに 済んだからね。\n い:
Yes, I did! Thanks to you guys, I didn't have
to break my promise to her. I can't thank you
enough!

311544.「その人は\n エドアルドさんにとって 大切な人なんだね。\n これからも ずっ:
I see that person is very important to you,
Eduardo. Will you continue to protect the town
for a long time to come?

311545.「当たり前じゃないか！\n 彼女が愛した ムニエカの町を\n 守ることこそが 僕:
It's no wonder! Protecting Munieka, whom she
loved, is what I am all about.

311546.「もう 彼女は 戻ってこないだろうと\n 言う人もいる。だけど 僕は\n どれだ:
Some say she will never come back. But I'm
going to keep waiting, no matter how long it
takes.

311547.「彼女が帰ってきたときに 昔と何ひとつ\n 変わらない町を見て 心から笑ってほし:
When she comes back, I want her to see a town that hasn't changed a bit and smile from the bottom of her heart! That's what I'm going to
keep trying to do.

311548.「それじゃあ みんな 元気で！\n もし 人形の身体になりたくなったら\n いつ:
Well then, take care everyone! If you ever
want to be in a doll's body, come visit me
anytime!

311549.「……あれっ？ なんだろ。\n 今 一瞬……何か 気配がしたような……？:
...Huh? What is it? For a moment just now...
did I seem to have a feeling...?

311551.この地方の 調査を終えた。\n引きつづき ほかの地方の 調査に向かおう。:
We have completed our survey of this region.
Let's continue to investigate other regions.

311552.調査隊を派遣した\n３つの地方 すべてで 調査を終えた。\nはじまりの地へ 戻ろ:
Now that we've completed our survey in all
three of the regions we sent our survey team
to, let's go back to the Land of Beginnings.

314637.「みんな 歌ったり 踊ったりしてるよ！\n なんだか 楽しそうな雰囲気の町だね。:
Everyone's singing and dancing! Seems like
this town has a fun atmosphere about it, huh?

314638.「<pc>隊長！ ポルテさん！\n 来てくださったのですね。: <pc>! Porte! It's good to see you.

314639.「あっ エッちゃんだー！\n 調査任務 お疲れさまー！:
Oh, Estie! Great work on your exploration
mission!

314640.「エ エッちゃんとは 私のことでしょうか？\n 愛称をつけてもらうのなんて 初め:
E-Estie...? Is that me you're referring to?
I've never been given a nickname before and
it's a little embarrassing, but...I'm happy.

314641.「……あれっ？\n そういえば ナブおじさんは？\n いっしょじゃないの？:
Huh...? Oh, by the way, where's Mr. Nab?
Is he not with you?

314642.「ナブおじさんとは……\n ナブレットさんのことですね。\n ふふっ あちらに:
Mr. Nab... Oh, you mean Nablette? He's right
over there.

314643.「ごきげんよう！\n ムニエカの町の 皆さん！:
Residents of Munieka!
How do you do?

314645.「ママ～ ふわふわの おにんぎょうさん～！\n かわいい～！: Mama! The fluffy doll is soooo cute!

314646.「こんな芸もできるなんて\n 最近のお人形は すごいわねぇ～。\n どんなしかけ:
It's amazing that dolls these days can do such
incredible tricks! What other kinds of tricks
do they have, I wonder?

314647.「おいおいッ 俺は お人形じゃねえって\n 何回も言ってるじゃねえか。\n プク:
Hey, hey! I've told you already that I'm no
doll. I come from a respectable race of
people called Pukulipo!

314649.「おっ <pc>隊長に\n ポルテの 嬢ちゃんじゃねえか！: Well, if it isn't the captain and Porte!

314650.「おや アンタたち エステラちゃんと\n ナブレットちゃんの 知り合いかい？\n:
Oh, so you two know Nablette and Estella?
Welcome to Munieka!

314651.「……そうだ！ この町の町長である\n エドアルドさんにも おふたりを\n ご紹:
Oh, that's right! I must introduce the both of
you to Mr. Eduardo. He's this town's mayor.

314652.「コイツ 全然 反省してねえな……。: This guy doesn't seem to be sorry at all...
